articles.title: Account holders of these 21 banks to get up to Rs 5 lakh, DICGC releases list - Zee Business
articles.description: DICGC will pay the depositors of the insured banks (as per list) placed under AID (with restrictions on withdrawal of deposits), an amount equivalent to the deposits outstanding (up to a maximum of Rupees Five Lakh only) within a period not exceeding 90 days.
